mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coursenju.grade(grade_id, course_id, student_id, student_name, total_score, usual_score, mid_score, final_score) VALUES(#{gradeId},#{courseId},#{studentId},#{studentName},#{totalScore},#{usualScore},#{midScore},#{finalScore})
mapper.select: SELECT id as id, grade_id as gradeId, course_id as courseId, student_id as studentId, student_name as studentName, total_score as totalScore, usual_score as usualScore, mid_score as midScore, final_score as finalScore FROM coursenju.grade WHERE grade_id=#{gradeId}

SELECT id as id, grade_id as gradeId, course_id as courseId, student_id as studentId, student_name as studentName, total_score as totalScore, usual_score as usualScore, mid_score as midScore, final_score as finalScore FROM coursenju.grade WHERE course_id=#{courseId}

SELECT id as id, grade_id as gradeId, course_id as courseId, student_id as studentId, student_name as studentName, total_score as totalScore, usual_score as usualScore, mid_score as midScore, final_score as finalScore FROM coursenju.grade WHERE student_id=#{studentId}
